export const emailSignature="
Karl McClelland
Professional Virtual Tour Creator
and Google Street View Partner
+44 7960 044 486 karl@360spaces.co.uk
360spaces.co.uk
Google Street View Virtual Tours - Bespoke Virtual Tours - Aerial and Commercial Photography - Short-form and Social Media Production • Social Media Mgt
Take advantage of our Google Street View Virtual Tour offer today. Click here for more information on the benefits this can offer to your business.

https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/
Recommend a virtual tour client
";export const emailTemplates=[{id:'welcome',label:'Intro Email 1',subject:'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}',body:"

Hello {first_name},

I'm Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I'd like to introduce myself and explore the opportunity to create a high-quality Google 360\xB0 virtual tour for {business_name}

With experience working with clients, such as local cafes, bars, restaurants, car showrooms, offices, hotels, shops, and schools, I offer virtual tour services that deliver proven benefits for businesses. Learn more about these advantages, including a special introductory offer, by visiting the following link:https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I will be in the {business_location} area on {return_visit} and would like to schedule a brief meeting with you or the owner to discuss a proposal and answer any questions they may have. If you find this convenient, please let me know, and we can work together to find a time that best fits your schedule.

The investment covers photography, virtual tour creation, and linking it to your Google business presence, ensuring the benefits you gain from the tour will quickly outweigh the cost. With no additional fees or costs, you can be confident that your investment will pay for itself.

I look forward to discussing a potential collaboration with {business_name} to create an immersive 360\xB0 virtual tour that showcases your offerings. If you have any questions or would like to schedule a meeting, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

I look forward to hearing back from you.

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'butchers',label:'Butcher Email',subject:'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}',body:"

Dear {first_name},

I am Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I specialise in creating high-quality custom and Google 360\xB0 virtual tours for businesses like {business_name}, helping to attract new customers and showcase your unique offerings.

Currently, I am working on an immersive virtual tour for Apperley's in Limavady, which you can preview here: https://360spaces.co.uk/retail/apperleys/. Although still in progress, this custom tour demonstrates the potential for your business to offer an engaging online experience for potential customers, partners, and suppliers, with tailored navigation and functionality.

In addition to the custom tour, the 360\xB0 imagery will also be connected to your Google business presence, enhancing visibility and accessibility. With no hidden fees or additional costs, investing in a virtual tour can help you stand out in a competitive market. As a Google partner, I ensure seamless integration of each tour with your Google business presence, increasing your online presence.

If you would like to learn more about the benefits a custom Google 360\xB0 virtual tour can bring to your business or wish to arrange a meeting or telephone call to discuss your specific requirements, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'butchers',label:'Butcher Email',subject:'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}',body:"

Dear {first_name},

I am Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I specialise in creating high-quality custom and Google 360\xB0 virtual tours for businesses like {business_name}, helping to attract new customers and showcase your unique offerings.

Currently, I am working on an immersive virtual tour for Apperley's in Limavady, which you can preview here: https://360spaces.co.uk/retail/apperleys/. Although still in progress, this custom tour demonstrates the potential for your business to offer an engaging online experience for potential customers, partners, and suppliers, with tailored navigation and functionality.

In addition to the custom tour, the 360\xB0 imagery will also be connected to your Google business presence, enhancing visibility and accessibility. With no hidden fees or additional costs, investing in a virtual tour can help you stand out in a competitive market. As a Google partner, I ensure seamless integration of each tour with your Google business presence, increasing your online presence.

If you would like to learn more about the benefits a custom Google 360\xB0 virtual tour can bring to your business or wish to arrange a meeting or telephone call to discuss your specific requirements, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'restaurants',label:'Restaurants, Cafes & Bars',subject:'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}',body:"

Dear {first_name},

I'm Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I’d love to help {business_name} stand out online with a high-quality Google 360\xB0 virtual tour.

Restaurants, cafes, and bars I've worked with have used their tours to showcase atmosphere, increase bookings, and bring in more footfall, especially from people searching nearby. It’s a proven way to make a great first impression. Learn more and see a special offer here:https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to stop by for a quick chat/site visit and maybe take some test photographs (at no cost).

The one-time fee includes photography, tour creation, and integration with your Google Business profile. There are no ongoing costs unless you would prefer a more custom, bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you’d like to schedule a time or ask anything. I’d love to show you what’s possible.

Best regards,
Karl

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'high_street_shop',label:'High St. Shops',subject:'The 360° Google Virtual Tour for {business_name}',body:"

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I’d love to help showcase the character of {business_name} with a 360\xB0 virtual tour.

Independent shops often have a unique story and space and a virtual tour brings that to life online and helps you get discovered on Google and Maps. You can see the benefits and an intro offer here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to call in for a quick chat and maybe take some test shots.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you preferred a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you’re interested. I’m happy to answer any questions.

All the best,
Karl

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'fast_food_shop',label:'Fast Food Place',subject:'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}',body:"

Hello {first_name},

I'm Karl, a Belfast-based Google-certified photographer specialising in 360\xB0 virtual tours. I'd love to help showcase {business_name} with a virtual tour linked to your Google profile.

Fast food decisions are made quickly, hence the name… and visual content plays a huge role. A virtual tour lets potential customers see your clean, welcoming space, helping you stand out online. Take a look at the benefits and a limited-time offer: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to stop in for a brief chat, to explain how it works and perhaps take some test photos.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Just reply and we can get a date booked in.

Thanks and hope to speak soon,
Karl

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'kitchen_bathroom_show',label:'Kitchen/Bath Showroom',subject:'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}',body:"

Dear {first_name},

I'm Karl, a Belfast-based Google Maps / Street View photographer, and I’d love to talk about creating a virtual tour for {business_name}.

Showrooms rely on strong visual impact and a 360\xB0 tour helps potential customers explore your space from home (or anywhere). It's perfect for highlighting layout, product displays, and style. You can explore the key benefits here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and can drop by to show examples, answer any questions and perhaps take some test photos for you.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you'd be interested in exploring this further.

Warm regards,

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'car_dealership',label:'Car Dealer and Showroom',subject:'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}',body:"

Dear {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Google Street View photographer based in Belfast, and I specialise in 360\xB0 virtual tours for dealerships like {business_name}.

A virtual tour lets people explore your showroom and forecourt before they visit which builds trust, a better understanding of the business and encourages them to call in. My clients often see improved visibility and engagement. See how it works here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would love to arrange a quick meeting with you or your sales/showroom manager.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you'd be interested in exploring this further.

Best,
Karl

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'dentist_health',label:'Health Clinic/Dentist',subject:'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}',body:"

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour specialist and Google partner. I’d like to propose the offer of a 360\xB0 virtual tour for {business_name} that helps put clients at ease and familiarise themselves before they arrive.

For clinics/wellness spaces, a tour promotes transparency and comfort, especially for first-time patients. It’s a great way to build trust online. See how it works and view an offer here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be near {business_location} on {return_date} and would be glad to visit for a quick consultation, answer any questions and perhaps take some test photos.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you'd be interested in exploring this further.

Kind regards,
Karl

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'estate_agent',label:'Estate Agents',subject:'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}',body:"

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based Google-certified virtual tour photographer. I’d like to offer a 360\xB0 tour for {business_name} that enhances your office profile and builds online trust.

Estate agencies benefit hugely from office tours that welcome clients to custom property walk-throughs. I offer both in superb high-quality. Learn more and view a current offer here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in {business_location} on {return_date} and would be happy to stop by for a quick overview of the options.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you'd be interested in exploring this further.

Kind regards,
Karl

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'independ_book_other',label:'Independent Bookstore and Other',subject:'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}',body:"

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I’d like to introduce myself and explore the idea of creating a 360\xB0 virtual tour for {business_name}.

Independent businesses like yours are full of character and a virtual tour helps bring that charm online, giving people a reason to visit in person. You can see more about the key benefits and a current offer here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be visiting the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to meet for a brief, no-obligation chat and maybe take some test photos.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking/connecting the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Kind regards,
Karl

".concat(emailSignature," ")},{id:'gym_fitness',label:'Gym, Boxing, Fitness',subject:'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}',body:"

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I’d love to introduce myself and explore the idea of creating a 360\xB0 Google virtual tour for {business_name}.

Gyms and training spaces are best experienced physically and visually and a virtual tour lets people explore your facilities, equipment, and find out more about the layout and atmosphere/vibe before they visit or join. It helps build trust and drives new memberships. You can see more about the benefits and current offers here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to stop by for a brief, no-obligation chat, answer any questions and perhaps take some test photos.

The cost is all-inclusive: professional photography, virtual tour build, and full integration with your Google listing. No subscriptions or ongoing fees unless you would be more interested in something more bespoke.

If you're interested or curious, just reply and we’ll line something up.

Kind regards,

".concat(emailSignature," ")}// Add more templates here ];import{formatDate}from'./utils/dateUtils';export const fillTemplate=(template,details)=>{return template.replace(/{first_name}/g,details.first_name||'').replace(/{business_name}/g,details.business_name||'').replace(/{business_location}/g,details.business_location||'').replace(/{return_date}/g,formatDate(details.return_date||''));};

sourcesContent:
export const emailSignature = `
Karl McClelland
Professional Virtual Tour Creator
and Google Street View Partner
+44 7960 044 486 karl@360spaces.co.uk
360spaces.co.uk
Google Street View Virtual Tours - Bespoke Virtual Tours - Aerial and Commercial Photography - Short-form and Social Media Production • Social Media Mgt
Take advantage of our Google Street View Virtual Tour offer today. Click here for more information on the benefits this can offer to your business.

https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/
Recommend a virtual tour client
`; export const emailTemplates = [ { id: 'welcome', label: 'Intro Email 1', subject: 'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}', body: `

Hello {first_name},

I'm Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I'd like to introduce myself and explore the opportunity to create a high-quality Google 360° virtual tour for {business_name}

With experience working with clients, such as local cafes, bars, restaurants, car showrooms, offices, hotels, shops, and schools, I offer virtual tour services that deliver proven benefits for businesses. Learn more about these advantages, including a special introductory offer, by visiting the following link:https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I will be in the {business_location} area on {return_visit} and would like to schedule a brief meeting with you or the owner to discuss a proposal and answer any questions they may have. If you find this convenient, please let me know, and we can work together to find a time that best fits your schedule.

The investment covers photography, virtual tour creation, and linking it to your Google business presence, ensuring the benefits you gain from the tour will quickly outweigh the cost. With no additional fees or costs, you can be confident that your investment will pay for itself.

I look forward to discussing a potential collaboration with {business_name} to create an immersive 360° virtual tour that showcases your offerings. If you have any questions or would like to schedule a meeting, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

I look forward to hearing back from you.

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'butchers', label: 'Butcher Email', subject: 'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}', body: `

Dear {first_name},

I am Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I specialise in creating high-quality custom and Google 360° virtual tours for businesses like {business_name}, helping to attract new customers and showcase your unique offerings.

Currently, I am working on an immersive virtual tour for Apperley's in Limavady, which you can preview here: https://360spaces.co.uk/retail/apperleys/. Although still in progress, this custom tour demonstrates the potential for your business to offer an engaging online experience for potential customers, partners, and suppliers, with tailored navigation and functionality.

In addition to the custom tour, the 360° imagery will also be connected to your Google business presence, enhancing visibility and accessibility. With no hidden fees or additional costs, investing in a virtual tour can help you stand out in a competitive market. As a Google partner, I ensure seamless integration of each tour with your Google business presence, increasing your online presence.

If you would like to learn more about the benefits a custom Google 360° virtual tour can bring to your business or wish to arrange a meeting or telephone call to discuss your specific requirements, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'butchers', label: 'Butcher Email', subject: 'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}', body: `

Dear {first_name},

I am Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I specialise in creating high-quality custom and Google 360° virtual tours for businesses like {business_name}, helping to attract new customers and showcase your unique offerings.

Currently, I am working on an immersive virtual tour for Apperley's in Limavady, which you can preview here: https://360spaces.co.uk/retail/apperleys/. Although still in progress, this custom tour demonstrates the potential for your business to offer an engaging online experience for potential customers, partners, and suppliers, with tailored navigation and functionality.

In addition to the custom tour, the 360° imagery will also be connected to your Google business presence, enhancing visibility and accessibility. With no hidden fees or additional costs, investing in a virtual tour can help you stand out in a competitive market. As a Google partner, I ensure seamless integration of each tour with your Google business presence, increasing your online presence.

If you would like to learn more about the benefits a custom Google 360° virtual tour can bring to your business or wish to arrange a meeting or telephone call to discuss your specific requirements, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'restaurants', label: 'Restaurants, Cafes & Bars', subject: 'Introducing 360° Virtual Tour Services for {business_name}', body: `

Dear {first_name},

I'm Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I’d love to help {business_name} stand out online with a high-quality Google 360° virtual tour.

Restaurants, cafes, and bars I've worked with have used their tours to showcase atmosphere, increase bookings, and bring in more footfall, especially from people searching nearby. It’s a proven way to make a great first impression. Learn more and see a special offer here:https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to stop by for a quick chat/site visit and maybe take some test photographs (at no cost).

The one-time fee includes photography, tour creation, and integration with your Google Business profile. There are no ongoing costs unless you would prefer a more custom, bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you’d like to schedule a time or ask anything. I’d love to show you what’s possible.

Best regards,
Karl

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'high_street_shop', label: 'High St. Shops', subject: 'The 360° Google Virtual Tour for {business_name}', body: `

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I’d love to help showcase the character of {business_name} with a 360° virtual tour.

Independent shops often have a unique story and space and a virtual tour brings that to life online and helps you get discovered on Google and Maps. You can see the benefits and an intro offer here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to call in for a quick chat and maybe take some test shots.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you preferred a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you’re interested. I’m happy to answer any questions.

All the best,
Karl

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'fast_food_shop', label: 'Fast Food Place', subject: 'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}', body: `

Hello {first_name},

I'm Karl, a Belfast-based Google-certified photographer specialising in 360° virtual tours. I'd love to help showcase {business_name} with a virtual tour linked to your Google profile.

Fast food decisions are made quickly, hence the name… and visual content plays a huge role. A virtual tour lets potential customers see your clean, welcoming space, helping you stand out online. Take a look at the benefits and a limited-time offer: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to stop in for a brief chat, to explain how it works and perhaps take some test photos.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Just reply and we can get a date booked in.

Thanks and hope to speak soon,
Karl

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'kitchen_bathroom_show', label: 'Kitchen/Bath Showroom', subject: 'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}', body: `

Dear {first_name},

I'm Karl, a Belfast-based Google Maps / Street View photographer, and I’d love to talk about creating a virtual tour for {business_name}.

Showrooms rely on strong visual impact and a 360° tour helps potential customers explore your space from home (or anywhere). It's perfect for highlighting layout, product displays, and style. You can explore the key benefits here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and can drop by to show examples, answer any questions and perhaps take some test photos for you.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you'd be interested in exploring this further.

Warm regards,

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'car_dealership', label: 'Car Dealer and Showroom', subject: 'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}', body: `

Dear {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Google Street View photographer based in Belfast, and I specialise in 360° virtual tours for dealerships like {business_name}.

A virtual tour lets people explore your showroom and forecourt before they visit which builds trust, a better understanding of the business and encourages them to call in. My clients often see improved visibility and engagement. See how it works here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would love to arrange a quick meeting with you or your sales/showroom manager.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you'd be interested in exploring this further.

Best,
Karl

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'dentist_health', label: 'Health Clinic/Dentist', subject: 'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}', body: `

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour specialist and Google partner. I’d like to propose the offer of a 360° virtual tour for {business_name} that helps put clients at ease and familiarise themselves before they arrive.

For clinics/wellness spaces, a tour promotes transparency and comfort, especially for first-time patients. It’s a great way to build trust online. See how it works and view an offer here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be near {business_location} on {return_date} and would be glad to visit for a quick consultation, answer any questions and perhaps take some test photos.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you'd be interested in exploring this further.

Kind regards,
Karl

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'estate_agent', label: 'Estate Agents', subject: 'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}', body: `

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based Google-certified virtual tour photographer. I’d like to offer a 360° tour for {business_name} that enhances your office profile and builds online trust.

Estate agencies benefit hugely from office tours that welcome clients to custom property walk-throughs. I offer both in superb high-quality. Learn more and view a current offer here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in {business_location} on {return_date} and would be happy to stop by for a quick overview of the options.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Let me know if you'd be interested in exploring this further.

Kind regards,
Karl

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'independ_book_other', label: 'Independent Bookstore and Other', subject: 'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}', body: `

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I’d like to introduce myself and explore the idea of creating a 360° virtual tour for {business_name}.

Independent businesses like yours are full of character and a virtual tour helps bring that charm online, giving people a reason to visit in person. You can see more about the key benefits and a current offer here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be visiting the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to meet for a brief, no-obligation chat and maybe take some test photos.

The price includes everything: photography, tour creation, and linking/connecting the finished tour to your Google business presence. No extra fees or subscriptions unless you would prefer a more bespoke virtual tour.

Kind regards,
Karl

${emailSignature} ` }, { id: 'gym_fitness', label: 'Gym, Boxing, Fitness', subject: 'Google Maps 360° Virtual Tour for {business_name}', body: `

Hello {first_name},

I’m Karl, a Belfast-based virtual tour photographer and Google partner. I’d love to introduce myself and explore the idea of creating a 360° Google virtual tour for {business_name}.

Gyms and training spaces are best experienced physically and visually and a virtual tour lets people explore your facilities, equipment, and find out more about the layout and atmosphere/vibe before they visit or join. It helps build trust and drives new memberships. You can see more about the benefits and current offers here: https://karlmcclelland.carrd.co/

I’ll be in the {business_location} area on {return_date} and would be happy to stop by for a brief, no-obligation chat, answer any questions and perhaps take some test photos.

The cost is all-inclusive: professional photography, virtual tour build, and full integration with your Google listing. No subscriptions or ongoing fees unless you would be more interested in something more bespoke.

If you're interested or curious, just reply and we’ll line something up.

Kind regards,

${emailSignature} ` }, // Add more templates here ]; import { formatDate } from './utils/dateUtils'; export const fillTemplate = (template: string, details: any) => { return template .replace(/{first_name}/g, details.first_name || '') .replace(/{business_name}/g, details.business_name || '') .replace(/{business_location}/g, details.business_location || '') .replace(/{return_date}/g, formatDate(details.return_date || '')); };
